Understand the the line.text: Now that we've read the first line, we will ask some clarifying questions.

tokensOfLine.text: How is the Gemara interpreting the specificity of the Mishnah?

tokens.text: How is the Gemara interpreting the specificity of the Mishnah?

tokensOfLine.text: And where would we find a raya to this principle that the Mishnah teaches the biggest chiddush?
